content: CHICAGO (Reuters Breakingviews) - The Brazilian billionaires at 3G Capital that turned Kraft Heinz and Anheuser-Busch InBev into mega-acquisition machines will dive back into the buying business in the coming year. Their next target should be Mondelez  the $66 billion food conglomerate that failed to coax chocolate-maker Hershey into a sale in 2016. A deal will require some unusual ingredients.    3G - co-founded by banker-turned-beer-magnate Jorge Paulo Lemann - gobbled up Heinz for $28 billion
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: 3G will take another bite of Corporate America

name: Mondelez International Inc
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. CFTC sues Kraft  Mondelez over alleged wheat price manipulation

content: CHICAGO  April 2 Emails between former senior executives at Kraft Foods  including its chief financial officer and a top procurement director  are among the evidence in a U.S. lawsuit accusing the company and Mondelez International of manipulating wheat prices.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Kraft Foods emails lay out plan to depress U.S. wheat prices -CFTC

content: NEW YORK  March 2 Scott Amoye  who ran Mondelez International Inc's cocoa business  has left after five year years with one of the world's largest chocolate companies and the maker of Cadbury chocolates and Oreo cookies  he confirmed to Reuters on Monday.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: MOVES-Mondelez's cocoa chief Amoye leaves after 5 years

content: MILAN Italy's Lavazza has exclusive rights to consider buying the European Carte Noire business of U.S.–based Mondelez International   the two companies said on Tuesday.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Italy's Lavazza has exclusive rights to consider Carte Noire buy

content: BRUSSELS/MILAN  Feb 23 Mondelez International  and DE Master Blenders 1753 proposed on Monday selling the Carte Noir coffee brand instead of two smaller marques to soothe European competition concerns about their merger.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Mondelez  DE Master Blenders propose Carte Noir sale

content: BRUSSELS/MILAN  Feb 23 Mondelez International  and D.E. Master Blenders 1753 proposed on Monday selling the Carte Noire coffee brand instead of two smaller marques to soothe European competition concerns about their merger.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Mondelez  DE Master Blenders propose Carte Noire sale

content: BRUSSELS  Feb 23 The following are mergers under review by the European Commission and a brief guide to the EU merger process:
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: EU mergers and takeovers (Feb 23)

content: Kraft Foods Group Inc said on Thursday that its chief financial officer would leave her role and two other senior executives would depart from the company  marking the first major changes at the maker of Velveeta cheese and Oscar Mayer meats since its board chairman took over as chief executive in December.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Kraft Foods shakes up leadership  reports quarterly loss

content: Kraft Foods Group Inc said its chief financial officer and two other senior executives would leave the company  and the maker of Velveeta cheese and Oscar Mayer meats reported a quarterly loss due to a charge related to its pension plan.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Kraft Foods shakes up leadership  reports quarterly loss

content: Mondelez International Inc   the maker of Cadbury chocolate and Oreo cookies  reported a better-than-expected adjusted quarterly profit and said it expects cost cuts to boost its full-year adjusted operating margin in 2015.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Mondelez beats profit forecast  sees higher margin in 2015

content: Feb 11 Mondelez International Inc  the maker of Cadbury chocolate and Oreo cookies  reported a better-than-expected adjusted quarterly profit and said it expects cost cuts to boost its full-year adjusted operating margin in 2015.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Mondelez beats profit forecast  sees higher margin in 2015

content: Feb 11 Mondelez International Inc  the maker of Cadbury chocolate and Oreo cookies  reported a near 72 percent fall in quarterly profit as sales across all key markets fell.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Mondelez profit falls 72 pct as sales fall in all regions

content: NEW YORK Anielle Troyan  a call center worker in New York  shops at discount retailers such as Family Dollar for items like soap and detergent as well as groceries like Kraft macaroni and cheese and small-sized condiments. | Video
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Velveeta revives as young and poor shop dollar stores for groceries

content: BRUSSELS  Jan 22 European Union antitrust regulators have extended by one week a review of a plan by Mondelez International and D.E. Master Blenders 1753 to merge their coffee businesses.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: EU extends coffee merger deal review deadline to May 13

content: BRUSSELS  Jan 22 The following are mergers under review by the European Commission and a brief guide to the EU merger process:
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: EU mergers and takeovers (Jan 22)

content: LONDON  Jan 12 Mondelez International  maker of Cadbury Creme Eggs  has tweaked the recipe of the chocolate shell of its gooey treats ahead of their main Easter selling season  sparking an angry response in Cadbury's home market of Britain.
name: Mondelez International Inc
title: Outrage in Britain as Cadbury owner tweaks Creme Egg recipe
